attributes.action: 80% Take-Home Income Cover For ALL Tradespeople/Smaller Businesses
attributes.additional_details:
Most of the above are either sole traders or worker-director limited companies. These are people who may not receive a full salary via the PAYE system. 

Some may have a monthly income via dividends. Others may have fluctuating salaries based wholly on their profit that month.

In this time of national crisis, we need the Government to guarantee up to 80% income for ALL workers, not just those based on the PAYE system.

We are the backbone of the private sector in the UK. Help us to survive.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call on the Chancellor to extend the 80% wages pledge to become an OVERALL income pledge so it would cover ALL tradespeople and sole traders.
